/circle6 Emphasise the importance of a high protein diet, including items such as black gram, 
groundnuts, ragi, whole grains, milk, eggs, meat and nuts, for anaemic women. 
/circle6 Encourage the woman to take plenty of fruits and vegetables containing vitamin C 
(e.g. mango, guava, orange and sweet lime), as these enhance the absorption of iron.
